titleStmt.title: A poem occasioned by the death of Her Majesty. By a person of honour
titleStmt.author: Person of honour.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by J. Whitlock, near Stationers-hall,

notesStmt.note: With added caption title on p. 1: On Her Majesty's decease.
